text: - Amdahl's Law - Applications 1 " Better Parallel Joins. Need to allow parallel plans on ' both sides of a hash join (via Parallel Shared Hash) or merge join (via TBD). * Better Parallel Aggregate. Need to allow parallel aggregation without terminating parallelism. * More Work on InitPlan/SubPlan Restrictions. Parameter references make tables parallel-restricted. Uncorrelated subplans are re-executed. - Parallel Bitmap Index Scan. P.‘,‘:,‘“f:.‘f(‘,‘;";.ﬁ‘"“ijjl"‘";' ' scan is good, but sometimes the index scan IS quite expensive.
